actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the definition of unrelated business income.

summary.text: Excludes income from the issuance of options to buy or sell property from the definition of unrelated business income for income tax purposes. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 512(b)(5))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the definition of unrelated business income.
